amendment.description: Amendment requires each of the SBA district offices to establish a marketing plan for rural businesses regarding financing and investment alternatives; to designate an employer as a Rural Business Outreach Specialist; and to host at least one annual outreach seminar.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to require each of the SBA district offices to establish a marketing plan for rural businesses regarding financing and investment alternatives, designate an employer as a Rural Business Outreach Specialist, and host at least one annual outreach seminar.
